availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Harrodsburg, Kentucky, coach maker. Maryland native. Married to Bettie P. Burton Cochran on December 18, 1854. Father of Lucy M. Cochran, Emma A. Cochran, and Thomas C. Cochran. Coach maker in Harrodsburg in 1850. Coach maker in Harrodsburg in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, Harrodsburg, District 2, p. 365B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, Harrodsburg, p. 23.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Maryland, Baltimore County, Baltimore Ward 7, p. 336.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, County Marriages, Film #000191861, p. 386.
